objects.name: Text
objects.string: Hello there! Fellow Hero. Can YOU figure out a way to the exit. Behind one of these doors is the path to your goal. Click on any one of the door to find out.

objects.name: Text
objects.string:
Press SPACE Key To START

Use LEFT and RIGHT Key To Navigate

objects.name: Win
objects.string:
Nicely Done You Win

Press SPACE To Go To Next Round

objects.name: Lose
objects.string:
Better Luck Next Time

Press SPACE To Continue
